structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
PUBLIC WORKS IN CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 34. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3102, 3459, 3577.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Improvement bonds of city may be authorized by election -- Issue and sale -- Tax for payment.
